title: ADIFF 2015 - An Honest Living
desc: (US PREMIERE)?After spending 5 years without a job, William wants his son to have his birthday gift, a pair of soccer boots. Lindiwe wants to give him the means to have them. But first, they must deal with the dead body in her house? Directed by Zuko Nodada, South Africa, 2014, 93min,?drama in English and Xhosa & Zulu with English subtitles.
